role.description: The user's role in the system.

Quiz.title: Quiz
Quiz.description: Represents a quiz created by a teacher.

creatorId.description: The UID of the teacher who created the quiz.

classIds.description: A list of class IDs this quiz is assigned to.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the quiz was created.

Question.title: Question
Question.description: Represents a single question within a quiz.

options.description: A list of options for multiple-choice questions.

correctAnswer.description: The correct answer for the question.

QuizSubmission.title: Quiz Submission
QuizSubmission.description: Represents a student's submission for a quiz.

quizId.description: The ID of the quiz being submitted.

studentId.description: The UID of the student who submitted the quiz.

answers.description: An object where keys are question IDs and values are the student's answers.

score.description: The calculated score for the submission.

totalQuestions.description: The total number of questions in the quiz.

submittedAt.description: The timestamp when the submission was made.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

body.description: The body content of the notification.

link.description: A URL to navigate to when the notification is clicked.

read.description: Whether the user has read the notification.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the notification was created.

Class.title: Class
Class.description: Represents a class created by a teacher.

teacherId.description: The UID of the teacher who created the class.

studentIds.description: A list of UIDs of students enrolled in the class.

isLive.description: Indicates if the class is currently live.

jitsiRoomName.description: The unique name for the Jitsi video conference room.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a class chat.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

senderName.description: The display name of the sender.

timestamp.description: The time the message was sent.

/users/{userId}/notifications/{notificat.description: Stores notifications for a specific user.

/quizzes/{quizId}.description: Stores the main information for each quiz.

/quizzes/{quizId}/questions/{questionId}.description: Stores the questions for a specific quiz.

/quizzes/{quizId}/submissions/{submissio.description: Stores student submissions for a specific quiz.

/classes/{classId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores chat messages for a specific class.
